resparty_name: FAKIR ALI @ FAKI CHAN ALI CHAN SK

business_details.Business: Case record is received  on transfer from the Hon&#039ble Sessions Judge, Dhubri and put up before me as the P.O. is transferred. Issue summons to the accused.
Learned counsel for the accused Fakir Ali @ Fakirchan Ali Sk has prayed for another date for appearance of the accused vide petition no. 1045/19. Prayer is allowed.

Accused Fakir Ali alias Fakir Chan Ali Sk has appeared before this court along with a copy of order dated 08.08.19 passed by the Honourable Gauhati High Court, in Case No. AB 2325/19 and filed a petition being No. 1261/19 praying for allowing him to go on bail as the Honourable Gauhati High Court has already granted bail.PThe order passed by the Honourable Gauhati High court is not altered/modified or cancelled by the Honourable High Court Hence, the accused Fakir Ali alias Fakir Chan Ali Sk is granted bail for Rs. 10,000/- (Rupees ten thousand) only with one suitable surety of the like amount.Copy is furnished to the accused person.Bail bond for the accused Fakir Ali alias Fakir Chan Ali Sk has been submitted by his bailor, Somer Ali Sk. The same is checked, verified and accepted till next date. Keep the document with case record till next date.
Charged is framed against the accused person. Issue summon to the witnesses.

Accused person is present. Three witnesses are present. They are examined, cross examined and discharged. One witness namely Abdul Hoque Mondal is discharged without examination as his name does not match with the charge-sheet. Issue summons to other witnesses.
P.O. is not on duty due to prevention of Coronavirus. Accused as well as witnesses are absent due to Lockdown. Issue summons to witnesses.
